snippet.title: Cable employee admits replacing Superbowl feed with porn
snippet.description:
Cable employee admits replacing Superbowl feed with porn
An Arizona man has admitted he was the one who interrupted the 2009 Superbowl broadcast to thousands of cable subscribers and replaced it with footage from an X-rated porno flick, according to published news reports. Frank Tanori Gonzalez pleaded guilty to two counts of computer tampering in a plea agreement that called for him â€¦
Dan Goodin, 21 Oct 2011
